alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 4:17AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 416 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from East Lake to 6 miles west of Harbor Bluffs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Lutz, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, Tampa International Airport, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, West And East Lealman, Ridgecrest, Bay Pines, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Harbor Bluffs, and Citrus Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
